gov.cdc.ncphi.phgrid.services.gipse.common
Class AxisUtils

java.lang.Object
  gov.cdc.ncphi.phgrid.services.gipse.common.AxisUtils

public class AxisUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for serializing/deserializing Axis beans generated with wsdl2java to/from xml. Inspired by blog post: http://bwithers.wordpress.com/2006/07/29/serializing-an-axis-javabean-object-to-xml/

Author:
Brian Alexander Lee (brianalee@gmail.com)
Created On:
2009.05.28 2252-04

          Serialize an axis bean into an xml string.
